Articles.Content:
I have created a spreadsheet to help with Delta V calculations for rescaled stock systems. It is a rough draft and I would bet real money that the atmosphere numbers are way off but here it is anyway.

 

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1J76UA50pjSaA0YjlYB_RR6ZwK0FBFYqQEfQpivR_-K0/edit?usp=sharing
